EmailTemplate.name: Independent's Guide.IG Lead Email 8
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, when did you last refresh your brand?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, If it's been a while since the last time you shook up your marketing strategy, check out our new article from MBO's Independent's Guide: Refreshing Your Brand as an Independent Consultant <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/grow/refreshing-your-brand-independent-consultant>. Hajj Flemings, our upcoming webinar <http://info.mbopartners.com/22AugWebDigitalStrategies_RegistrationPage.html> presenter, uses concrete examples to explain how trying something new can help you attract more business and jump-start your pipeline this year. MBO Partners is here to guide you through the process, so if you have any further questions about your personal brand or independent consulting in general, please don't hesitate to ask. ___________________________________ Aassia Haq Chief Marketing Officer MBO Partners
e: communications@mbopartners.com <mailto:info@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
